meanings: ('주다'의 높임말) give[offer] (sb sth / sth to sb)
사과와 용서 This is my token of apology.
사과와 용서 I'd like to you something as a symbol of my apology.
실용회화-기타 This is on the house.
실용회화-기타 This is a free gift.

meanings.meaning: a free gift for every reader
I beg leave to inform you of it.

vlive.korean: 진짜 왜 저러는 거야 진짜 - 지민 씨 어느 부분을 보여드리는 게 좋을까요? Why is he doing that? - Which part, Jimin? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: Why is he doing that? - Which part, Jimin?

vlive.korean: 드시고 싶은 술 만들어드리는 게 바텐더 아닌가요? Make drinks for our customers, that's our job, right? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 너무 좋아해서 짝사랑만 하는 거 이해됨? [엑스엑스(XX)] - EP.04

vlive.korean: 낮이든 밤이든 겨드랑이 치는 걸 보여드리는 거 조금 그렇지 않나? Isn't it weird to show you hitting my armpit during the day or night? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 다시 🐢
vlive.english: Isn't it weird to show you hitting my armpit during the day or night?

vlive.korean: [포토월 현장!][많은 분들에게 인사드리는 ITZY] 인사드리겠습니다, 둘 셋! [Photo wall] [Saying hi to the audience] Hi, let us say our greetings. 듣기 View video ITZY : [ITZY? ITZY!(있지?있지!)] EP47. 아육대에 있지!

vlive.korean: [어차피 언제 쳐도] 겨드랑이 치는 걸 보여드리는 건 조금 그렇지 않나? [No matter when he does it] Isn't it weird for me to do that on V LIVE? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [MONSTA X] 겨드랑이가 있는데 왜 치지를 못하니.. 채씨의 <겨드랑이 치기 좋은 날>🐢 (Hyungwon's how to remove swelling out)
vlive.english: [No matter when he does it] Isn't it weird for me to do that on V LIVE?
